root.name: Snow Bros 2
root.description: Gameplay The Gameplay of this game is identical to its predecessors. Pick a dude hit the attack button and then kick him.New FeaturesThe new feature that many fans would love to know is that up to 4 players can play this game at a time. And along with nick there are four new characters with new powers like electricity,water and wind. And the new bosses and a different story line are enough to make you think that you are not playing the same old previous Snow Bros.Â
